name: Poriverse
description: Launched in 15/4/2022, by a team based in Vietnam, Poriverse is the first NFT game to allow players to lend and trade NFT to earn more, thus opening a new chapter for the NFT game industry. Now with NFT renting technology, the cost of entry has been lowered for not only experienced crypto gamers and NFT holders who want to diversify their portfolio but also newcomers in the P2E arena. Poriverse mission is - Redefine the standard of NFT game with our craftsmanship - To lower entry barriers so anyone can play and have fun - To unlock all features of NFT technology
